name: 7 Hills of Lisbon with Instant Photo Memories
description: In this walking tour I will take you out and about in Lisbon, on an extraordinary tour to see the 7 hills on which this magnificent city was once build upon, about 5000 years ago. Expect some very picturesque but steep streets and unexpected and stunning views around each corner. When you get tired, there is of course always an iconic tram or a funicular to take to avoid climbing those steep streets.
